document_title: Aortic valve stenosis: Symptoms, causes and treatments
subsection_name: hep-van-dong-mach-chu.json_8_What do you need to prepare before going to the doctor?
subsection_content:
Write down your symptoms, how long have you had them, how frequent are the symptoms? How severe are the symptoms? What seems to improve or worsen symptoms? Does anyone in your family have heart disease?; Make a list of your important medical information, including any other recent health problems you have had as well as all medications and supplements you are taking.; Bring relatives and friends with you because they can help you remember what the doctor says.
Aortic valve stenosis can lead to many dangerous complications, seriously affecting the patient's health and quality of life. Therefore, each person needs to be aware of disease prevention and have regular check-ups with a Cardiologist to receive appropriate treatment. Cardiovascular Center, Tam Anh General Hospital brings together a team of leading experts and experienced doctors with the support of a modern equipment system to help diagnose diseases accurately and have appropriate treatment methods. fusion for each patient.
